query:
SELECT id, "userId", "recordId", date, duration, distance, "avgSpeed", "maxSpeed", "startTime", "endTime", "createdAt" 
FROM "ridingRecords" 
WHERE "userId" IN (SELECT id FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%로버%' OR name LIKE '%rover%' OR name LIKE '%Rover%')
ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC
LIMIT 50;
